::Firearm::

Firearm hears ShadowStalker, the Maximal activating his comm-link.

"Firearm here," he says into it, sending the transmission to ShadowStalker, 
"I've engaged the Preds, you can help out if you want."

He turns back to the battle, firing another shot at Injector.
